message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.GT, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with online learning algorithms, which are commonly studied in the machine learning community (cs.LG). The problem of choosing from a subset of actions is also related to the field of decision making under uncertainty, which falls under artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses approximation algorithms, which are a topic in theoretical computer science (cs.DS). The concept of regret is related to game theory (cs.GT), and the paper uses techniques from information theory (cs.IT) to analyze the problem.
